verses.kjv: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
verses.ct: So hold firmly to the freedom that Christ has given us, and don't let yourselves be trapped under the burden of slavery again.

verses.kjv: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.
verses.ct: Listen, I Paul am telling you directly: if you get circumcised, Christ will be of no benefit to you at all.

verses.kjv: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.
verses.ct: I want to make it clear again to every person who gets circumcised that he is obligated to follow the entire law.

verses.kjv: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.
verses.ct: Those of you who are trying to be made right with God through the law have cut yourselves off from Christ — you have abandoned grace.

verses.kjv: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.
verses.ct: But through the Spirit and by faith, we eagerly wait for the righteousness we hope for.

verses.kjv: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.
verses.ct: Because when you are united with Jesus Christ, neither circumcision nor the lack of it matters at all. The only thing that counts is faith expressing itself through love.

verses.kjv: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?
verses.ct: You were making such great progress! Who got in your way and kept you from following the truth?

verses.kjv: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.
verses.ct: That kind of influence is not coming from the one who called you.

verses.kjv: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.
verses.ct: Just a small amount of yeast works its way through the entire batch of dough.

verses.kjv: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.
verses.ct: I am confident in the Lord that you will come around to my way of thinking. But whoever is stirring up confusion among you will face God's judgment, no matter who they are.

verses.kjv: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, if I were still promoting circumcision, why would I still be facing persecution? If that were the case, the offense of the cross would no longer be an issue.

verses.kjv: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.
verses.ct: I wish those who are unsettling you would go all the way and castrate themselves!

verses.kjv: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, you were called to freedom. Just don't use that freedom as an excuse to satisfy your sinful desires. Instead, serve each other through love.

verses.kjv: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
verses.ct: The entire law is summed up in this single command: "Love your neighbor as yourself."

verses.kjv: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
verses.ct: But if you keep attacking and tearing each other apart, watch out — you'll end up destroying one another.

verses.kjv: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
verses.ct: So here's what I'm saying: let the Spirit guide your life, and you won't give in to the cravings of your sinful nature.

verses.kjv: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
verses.ct: The sinful nature craves what goes against the Spirit, and the Spirit desires what goes against the sinful nature. They are in direct opposition to each other, so you can't simply do whatever you want.

verses.kjv: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.
verses.ct: But if the Spirit is leading you, you are not under the authority of the law.

verses.kjv: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,
verses.ct: The behaviors that come from the sinful nature are obvious: sexual immorality, impurity, shameless indecency,

verses.kjv: Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,
verses.ct: idol worship, involvement with the occult, hostility, quarreling, jealousy, outbursts of anger, selfish ambition, divisions, factions,

verses.kjv: Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.
verses.ct: envy, murder, drunkenness, wild partying, and things like these. I'm warning you now, just as I warned you before: people who live this way will not inherit the kingdom of God.

verses.kjv: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
verses.ct: But the fruit that the Spirit produces is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

verses.kjv: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
verses.ct: humility, and self-control. There is no law that stands against any of these things.

verses.kjv: And they that are Christ’s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
verses.ct: Those who belong to Christ have nailed their sinful nature to the cross, along with all its passions and cravings.

verses.kjv: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
verses.ct: Since we live by the Spirit, let's also keep in step with the Spirit.

verses.kjv: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
verses.ct: Let's not become arrogant, provoking each other or being jealous of one another.
